reviews.review_msg: I've taken both Psych 100 and 102 from him, both online, and they were my favourite classes both semesters. Professor Day's class, even though very textbook heavy, was a lot of fun. Online we had class meetings to ask our questions twice a week and all of the lectures were pre-recorded. Overall amazing prof, 10/10 would take again!
I hated him! Thought he was witty and funny and made a few immature comments to "lighten up" the class. But he's really organized with his lectures and keeps his webct info up to date.
